title: Bloomberg Markets: Corr Says Trump Keeping North Korea Guessing
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Corr Says Trump Keeping North Korea Guessing
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Anders Corr Founder Corr Analytics Discussing U.S.-North Korea tensions and President Trump's foreign policy plan.
